divs: Sighting Detailsvisiting a friend in apple valley ca exited my vehicle looking west toward wrightwood ca , i noticed four objects low in the sky one bigger and brighter than the others , I thought maybe planets so i went inside and visited for about an hour. upon leaving I noticed they were still in the same location and took a photo with my I phone and went home i just recently went though my photos and was suprised at the quality
Summary: saw a multi colored object low in the horizon from apple valley
